summary: Build an installable Progressive Web App (PWA) version of the app for both desktop and mobile, including full-screen app-like behavior and an install prompt.
architectural_notes: PWA approach: use web app manifest + service worker; installation handled via browser (no APK generation).

existing_features.title: Ensure the service worker is registered in the running app so the browser can recognize the app as installable (PWA). Registration must occur once on app startup without editing any files in frontend/src/main.tsx or other immutable paths.

Update the PWA manifest to satisfy installability requirements for modern desktop/mobile browsers, keeping existing app name/branding intact. Ensure the manifest includes correct start_url/scope, standalone display, theme/background colors, and valid icon entries that resolve at runtime.
Add iOS-friendly PWA meta/link tags in the root HTML to improve install and full-screen behavior on iPhone/iPad (Add to Home Screen flow), without changing the core app UI.

Fix and harden the custom install UX so users can install from both desktop and mobile when eligible, and receive clear guidance when not eligible. Use the existing A2HSBanner and Sidebar “Install App” entry points and ensure they behave consistently once the app becomes installable.

Improve the service worker caching behavior for the app shell so the PWA remains functional when offline for previously visited pages/assets, while preserving the existing special handling that avoids auto-caching audio files (audio caching remains explicit via the existing offline cache utilities).

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the app an installable PWA on both desktop and mobile (manifest + service worker), with full-screen app-like display and an install prompt

projectName: Make the app fully installable as a PWA on desktop and mobile (install prompt + full-screen behavior)
